Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Madison
ShortDescription: SB 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Madison, Central, Jackson, and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Madison, Central, Jackson, and Austin due to, street blockage near Austin/Madison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems near Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems near Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
